scripts.copy-assets: mkdir -p public/dist public/wasm && cp node_modules/@matbee/libreoffice-converter/dist/browser.worker.global.js* public/dist/ && cp -r node_modules/@matbee/libreoffice-converter/wasm/* public/wasm/ && gzip -9 -f public/wasm/soffice.wasm && mv public/wasm/soffice.wasm.gz public/wasm/soffice.wasm && gzip -9 -f public/wasm/soffice.data && mv public/wasm/soffice.data.gz public/wasm/soffice.data
